    moments

    aa-moments.Rmd
    library(ecocom)

    Weight

    abun <- rpois(n = 10, lambda = 3)

scaled <- scale_weight(abun)

c(base = sum(abun), scaled = scaled)
#>        base     scaled1     scaled2     scaled3     scaled4     scaled5 
#> 27.00000000  0.03703704  0.07407407  0.00000000  0.18518519  0.22222222 
#>     scaled6     scaled7     scaled8     scaled9    scaled10 
#>  0.07407407  0.18518519  0.03703704  0.07407407  0.11111111

    Compute moment of trait distributions

    #vector of species abundance
abun <- rpois(n = 10, lambda = 3)
# vector of species trait
trait <- rnorm(n = 10, mean = 10, sd = 3)

calc_cw_moments(trait = trait, weight = abun)
#>      mean  variance  skewness  kurtosis 
#> 9.2173087 3.8571608 0.5489923 3.8425229
